name: Steamboat Willy
description:
Play as engineer Willy, that has to make sure the steam engines continue to function. During Willy's watch, issues keep popping up in the system. Willy needs to fix the issues with various items or tools to keep the steam system working. If he doesn't fix them in time, the steam engine will break down. 

Controls - 
WASD to move
Space to grab
Shift or F to drop
Control or C to use items
Joystick/dpad to move
B to grab
A to drop
Y to use

What fixes what?
Fire- Fire Extinguisher or a Bucket of Water
Smoke/Steam - Tape
Stopped Piston - Hammer
Puddle - Mop
Broken Valve - Wrench
